name: Dice Casino
description:
Just another regular day at the Dice Casino. The bar is bustling, the machines are rumbling. Nothing goes wrong in this casino!

This project was made during the GMTK Game Jam 2022 (in just 50 hours) and the theme was "Roll of the Dice". This is our first game jam so it was quite tough!

Please see the "CREDITS.txt" file for information about the authors of the assets and sounds used within this game.

Jumpscares included.
